name: Brick-Eyes Construction Falcon
text: If this card attacks a Defense position monster, inflict double piercing battle damage. During either player's Main Phase: You can banish 1 card from your hand or 1 "Brick-Eyes" monster from your GY except for "Brick-Eyes Construction Falcon"; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can only Special Summon "Brick-Eyes Construction Falcon" once per turn this way. The original ATK of this card becomes doubled whilst you have 3 or more banished monsters with different names.
